title: I Want To Enjoy A Country Life! - Novel Updates

description:
The protagonist – Kingdom's second son Aine – who is involved in an inheritance struggle with his two brothers, recalls the memories of his previous life in Japan where he lead an ordinary life. Aine loses his desire to fight for the inheritance and wishes to enjoy a country life, and that sort of Aine captivated his older brother and little brother.

This is a story of hate that later turned into love…>
